item.title: DAO List: 200 million LISTA tokens will be burned and removed from the total supply
item.description: August 14th. According to official channels, Lista DAO declared that the LIP-021 proposal has received approval. 20% of the maximum token supply of LISTA will be incinerated and deducted from the total supply.Previously reported, Lista DAO recently presented the LIP-021 proposal, aiming to permanently burn 20% of the maximum token supply of the LISTA token (approximately 200 million tokens), thereby reducing the maximum supply from 1 billion to 800 million, in order to achieve a more potent deflationary effect and enhance the stability of token value.

item.title: Futu Securities Announces Launch of Solana (SOL) Retail Trading Service
item.description: August 14th. According to the official announcement, Futu Securities has announced the initiation of Solana (SOL) retail trading services. Beginning today, eligible retail investors and professional investors in Hong Kong can conduct secure trading of SOL through the Futubull App. Meanwhile, SOL paper trading will also be launched on the platform shortly to assist more cryptocurrency beginners in becoming familiar with the trading process and mastering investment skills.In addition to SOL spot trading services, Futu has previously offered more stock-coin linkage opportunities, such as SOL CME futures and SOL ETF, enabling investors to make one-stop purchases of various assets related to SOL on Futu.

item.title: OVERTAKE Partners with Walrus Protocol to Advance On-Chain Gaming Asset Ownership
item.description: August 14th. As per official channels, OVERTAKE has made an announcement regarding a collaboration with the Web3 data layer project Walrus Protocol. This collaboration aims to grant players full ownership of in-game assets. By means of on-chain custody and decentralized data management, the in-game visuals, audio, and metadata will be stored in a permanent and verifiable manner, with the ownership vested in the players.OVERTAKE is a peer-to-peer game asset trading marketplace that is built on the Sui Network and enables secure transactions through smart contract custody.

item.title: US Stock Market Bullish (BLSH) Surges Over 16% in Pre-market Trading
item.description: On August 14th, based on the market data from Rockflow (https://rockflow.ai/en/crypto-stocks?utm_campaign=blockBeats), the US stock crypto exchange platform Bullish (BLSH) saw a surge of over 16% in pre-market trading and is currently at $79.45.

item.title: Robinhood has applied for a Dubai license, seeking to expand into the Middle East and North Africa market
item.description: On August 14th, as per the report from financefeeds, Robinhood is taking practical measures to expand into the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) market. The company has submitted an application for a license to the Dubai Financial Services Authority (DFSA), enabling it to legally provide foreign exchange and other trading services in the UAE. In order to advance this initiative, Robinhood has appointed senior executive Mario Camara, who has experience in financial services licensing and operations, to be in charge of the Dubai operations.

item.title: 「Meme Coin」 Google Search Volume Hits Highest Level Since February 2018
item.description: On August 14th, based on Google Trends data, the Google search volume for "Altcoin" skyrocketed to 77 yesterday, attaining the highest level since February 2018.

item.title: Two cryptocurrency exchanges stake 320,000 ETH, approximately $1.51 billion
item.description: On August 14th, according to Ashes Monitor, two cryptocurrency exchanges have staked 320,000 ETH, which is approximately $15.1 billion.BitFlyer is staking 240,000 ETH (about $11.34 billion). It announced the launch of the Ethereum staking feature two days ago and then started staking ETH. So far, 240,000 ETH has been transferred to the staking execution address for staking deposit.Binance is staking 80,000 ETH (approximately $3.78 billion). Half an hour ago, Binance transferred 80,000 ETH to the staking execution address and staked all of them.

item.title: A new address withdrew $5.05 million worth of LINK from Binance.
item.description: On August 14th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), a new address withdrew 210,924 LINK from Binance 6 hours ago. The amount withdrawn was worth $5.05 million.

item.title: Binance Alpha's new round of OVL airdrop yielded approximately $55.5 at the opening price.
item.description: On August 14th, according to market data, Overlay Protocol (OVL) has been listed on Binance Alpha. It is currently trading at $0.5, and the market capitalization is $8.05 million. Each eligible user can receive a 111 OVL token airdrop. Based on the current price, the estimated value of this airdrop is approximately $55.5.

item.title: Fed's Daly: A Sharp Rate Cut Next Month Seems Inappropriate
item.description: On August 14th, as reported by The Wall Street Journal, Fed's Powell said that it seems inappropriate to have a significant rate cut next month.
